name: Awakening Sarah - DEMO
description:
For the last few years I've been asked over and over if this project was still happening, and it indeed is - but not for a little while longer. The reason, as I've said a few times, is because I'm currently working on other projects to help pay my bills. I'm hopeful that once I'm done I can get back to working on this, but there's no ETA. 

Keep in mind that bugs are to be expected - this is more of a unfinished prototype than an actual demo.
